explains: adj. 积极主动的，主动出击的；前摄的（前一活动中的因素对后一活动造成影响的）
wordGroup: proactive fiscal policy 积极的财政政策

sentences.en: In order to survive the competition a company should be proactive not reactive.
sentences.cn: 为了能在竞争中立于不败之地，一个公司应积极行动而非被动应变。

sentences.en: I want our organization to be less reactive and more proactive.
sentences.cn: 我希望我们的组织少一些被动反应，能够更加积极主动些。

sentences.en: So we were being proactive and effective.
sentences.cn: 所以，我们是主动而实在的。
